Merge pull request #2 from eldenbishop/master

Fixed a bug where any map operations involving TupleN with less than 5 values would fail due to the read phase transforming the type to a lower order tuple. For example if you have a TupleN(tf.longs() tf.strings()) the tuple will become a Pair when read and throw a class cast exception. There is no way to avoid this other than never using TupleN which is very inconvenient if you are changing the number of params all the time while crafting queries.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:cloudera/crunch
Mark intermediate outputs as materialized so that any subsequent runs that reference them can use the materialized results

Fixed a bug where any map operations involving TupleN with less than 5 values would fail due to the read phase transforming the type to a lower order tuple. For example if you have a TupleN(tf.longs() tf.strings()) the tuple will become a Pair when read and throw a class cast exception. There is no way to avoid this other than never using TupleN which is very inconvenient if you are changing the number of params all the time while crafting queries.
